China says it won't turn a blind eye to Philippines' repeated 'provocations'China on Thursday said it will not turn a blind eye to repeated "provocations and harassment" by the Philippines, amid heightened tensions over a spate of run-ins in the South China Sea. South Korea police defend probe of 'Parasite' actor who was found deadThe head of the district police force that investigated South Korean actor Lee Sun-kyun over allegations of illegal drug use on Thursday defended the tough questioning of him before he was found dead. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 08:40:37 GMT GR57JRY2PBL37LYDTZD6URDLGY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-police-defend-probe-parasite-actor-who-was-found-dead-2023-12-28/Jack Kim, Jimin Jung世界亚太地区
Bangladesh garment factories fire workers after protests, unions sayBangladesh garment factories have fired hundreds of workers since protests in October demanding higher wages, three labour unions representing half a million workers told Reuters this week, while many others are on the run fearing arrest. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 08:29:26 GMT OSVER2HCTBMY5P2BSLGKUZJVLY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-garment-factories-fire-workers-after-protests-unions-say-2023-12-28/Ruma Paul, Kanjyik Ghosh世界亚太地区
China urges nationals to leave north Myanmar region amid unrestChina's embassy in Myanmar urged its nationals on Thursday to leave the Laukkai area in Kokang region in northern Myanmar as soon as possible, citing growing security risks. China urges regional alert as US military steps up forward deploymentChina's defence ministry on Thursday urged the Asia-Pacific to be on high alert as the United States steps up forward military deployment in the region, after reports of a U.S. plan to revive a Pacific airfield that launched atomic bombings of Japan. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 08:21:39 GMT MI4X3RCLLRMOXNKTICCF6YUCFY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-urges-regional-alert-us-military-steps-up-forward-deployment-2023-12-28/Reuters世界亚太地区

Three Hong Kong activists jailed up to 6 years for 'terrorism' bomb plotThree Hong Kong activists were jailed for up to six years on Thursday after pleading guilty to charges relating to a plan to place bombs in court buildings and other public infrastructure in 2021 following widespread pro-democracy protests. Russian plane lands on frozen river by mistake -prosecutorsA Soviet-era Antonov-24 aircraft carrying 30 passengers landed on a frozen river near an airport in Russia's far east on Thursday because of pilot error, transport prosecutors said.
